TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Colors extends System.Object

summary.span: 實作一組預先定義的色彩。

span.span: Implements a set of predefined colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation 色彩名稱符合.NET Framework 中，Windows Form 和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)]色彩名稱。The Windows Presentation Foundation color names match the .NET Framework, Windows Forms, and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)] color names. 此表示法以 UNIX 為基礎 X11 名為色彩值。This representation is based on UNIX X11 named color values. 下圖顯示每個預先定義的色彩，其名稱和十六進位值。The following image shows each predefined color, its name, and its hexadecimal value. ![預先定義的色彩](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "預先定義的色彩")![Predefined colors](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "Predefined colors") 色彩表包括色樣、 色彩的名稱和十六進位值Color Table including a color swatch, the color name, and the hexadecimal value 請參閱各種其他更複雜的方式，您可以色彩區域中，包括漸層的類別 (， ) 或映像 ()。See the class for a variety of other more complex ways you can color an area, including gradients (, ) or images (). ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 您無法宣告這個 managed 的類別[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但是您可以使用靜態屬性指派值在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
